function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Privacy concerns related to data collection and usage by the contact tracing app","Impact":"Potential misuse of user data, loss of trust in the app, and unwillingness to participate in contact tracing","Mitigation":"Assure transparency in data usage, implement strict data protection measures, and enforce legal repercussions for misuse","Technologies":"Encryption, data anonymization, secure data storage, and compliance with data privacy regulations","People":"App users, citizens, and government officials","Owner":"Government, app developers, and data protection authorities"},{"Description":"False sense of security provided by the voice-detection app for COVID-19 screening","Impact":"Delay in seeking medical attention, neglect of conventional diagnostic methods, and potential spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Clearly communicate the limitations of the app, encourage users to consult healthcare professionals, and emphasize that the app is not a replacement for medical testing","Technologies":"Education and awareness campaigns, clear disclaimers in the app, and collaboration with healthcare providers","People":"App users, healthcare professionals, and the general public","Owner":"App developers, healthcare organizations, and public health authorities"}]}
